@graph.name: Gonzalo D. Rubio
@graph.description:
Gonzalo D. Rubio currently works at the Agricultural Experimental Station (EEA-INTA), Cerro Azul, Misiones, National Scientific and Technical Research Council (CONICET), Argentina. Gonzalo D. does research in Systematics (Taxonomy) and Zoology. Their current project is 'Taxonomic studies, diversity and zoogeography of Salticidae (Araneae) from Argentina'.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"...and keeping in mind the overworked state of most spider taxonomists plus the parasitic relationship which behaviorists and ecologists generally enjoy with them, will undertake the description of this new species"... (William Eberhard, 1981).

affiliation.name: National Scientific and Technical Research Council (CONICET), Argentina
